professional.techs: NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, OpenCV, Dash, Flask, Keras, Tensorflow, SciPy, Scikit-learn, SpaCy, AWS (EC2), Unix.
professional.main_self_introduction: Welcome to my Sports Data Portfolio! I'm a data scientist and lifelong sports fan. These projects combine my love of sports with the technical skills I've developed as a data scientist, including analyzing player performance and evaluating the physical elements of sports, like momentum and movement. I hope you enjoy exploring them!

projects.title: Momentum and Missed Tackles (2024 Big Data Bowl)
projects.description: This investigation focuses on deriving actionable insights for both offensive and defensive strategies by analyzing the momentum of the ball carrier and the defender, with the goal of enhancing performance outcomes.

projects.title: Batter Scouting Scorecard (WiSD 2024 - Finalist)
projects.description: In this project, I have created four metrics to evaluate different parts of a batter's swing and provided a tool that allows a scout to fine-tune the target ranges for these metrics to generate a final overall rank for the batter.

page_elements.contact_message: Please reach out! I'd love to connect.
